name: The Lost City (GGJ South Bend 2021)
description:
Developed during Global Game Jam 2021 at South Bend location with Unreal Engine 4. Designed with classic psOne era  pre-rendered backgrounds, cel-shaded 3D characters, and 2D sprites.

Developed by:

uncool-and-uncouth (Taylor Wiley) - 2D Assets, concept art.

Andrew Jacobs, spador92 - 3D Assets, programming

vince94 - Music

A David Anweiler - Story, additional art and character design
